data.full_email_body:
Hi there,

Noticed how support teams are swamped with manual QA checks and inconsistent evaluations. That pain slows down resolution times and impacts customer satisfaction.

At Intryc, we've helped support leaders automate sampling and AI-driven assessments, cutting down review time and boosting accuracy. Our clients see faster feedback loops and happier customers.

Would you be open to a quick chat about how this could fit into your workflows? Happy to set up a quick meeting.

Best,
[Your Name]
